item.title: Family Left Devastated After Tragic Loss of Loved One at Temple and Sons Funeral Home
item.description: A Devastating Loss The family of a beloved family member is left devastated after a tragic loss at Temple and Sons Funeral Home This heartbreaking event has left the family in shock and filled with grief and sorrow Background Information The family had recently lost a beloved family member and had chosen Temple and Sons Funeral Home to handle the arrangements. Unfortunately, due to negligence and lack of professionalism, the family was left with a heartbreaking tragedy.
